item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery Adds 3.4 Million Streaming Subscribers, But ‘Minecraft’ and ‘Sinners’ Power Earnings
item.description: Thanks to box office hits, studios’ revenue hit $3.8 billion, up 55 percent from a year ago, in the second quarter.

item.title: JB Perrette, Bruce Campbell Renew Warner Bros. Contracts Ahead of Discovery Split
item.description: The new deals will hinge on the media giant carrying through with plans to split into Warner Bros. and Discovery Global, with new leadership teams.

item.title: HBO Max Hires ITV’s Sasha Breslau and Amazon’s Alessandro Volpato to Lead Acquisitions in U.K., Italy
